title: Huge 2 bed/1 bath. Full kitchen. Walk-in closets. Quiet, safe, secure.
app_fee: $50.00 application fee, credit check per adult.
posting_body: BETHANY VILLAGE IN DAHLONEGA!
Rare vacancy in this very popular, quiet and safe community.
2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment home in Bethany Village featuring two over-sized bedrooms with extra high ceilings and large, walk-in closets.
Less than ten minutes to The University of North Georgia, the Dahlonega Square and the Premium Outlet Mall.
Huge, open-concept living room and separate area for the dining room and/or eat-in kitchen.
The home offers a full sized Kitchen packed with extra cabinet space, refrigerator, dishwasher as well as washer/dryer hook-ups.
This is an oversized, family friendly apartment home.
Bethany Village offers a quiet, country setting yet just minutes to 400 and Highway 60.
Water, sewer, garbage service and lawn care all included for a monthly fee of only $65.00.
Extra storage units are available for only $20 per month.
There is a large Picnic pavilion with outdoor meeting space.
We offer a very quiet, safe, secure and party-free atmosphere.
We have full-time, Property Management staff members onsite everyday of the week to ensure your safety, security and quiet enjoyment of your new home.
We take the protection and safety of our clients as our highest priority with no unacceptable behavior permitted.
The grounds are meticulously maintained and policed of all debris on a daily basis.
This is the cleanest, most well-run apartment complex in Dahlonega.
We work hard to ensure that you will enjoy first class accommodations in a quiet, safe and professionally managed environment.
Please call today for more information and to schedule a showing.
This home is professionally managed and maintained in excellent condition.
Please note that we have a no pets and no smoking policy.
Please visit <URL> for more information and additional pictures.
Convenient to Murrayville, Gainesville, Cumming, Alpharetta, Blairsville, Suches, Clayton, Ellijay, Jasper, Ball Ground, Lumpkin, Dawson, White, Pickens and Hall.
